expectationsVar.info: As a parent, what do you expect from the Homework and Lesson Workshop at Aurore's House?

needsVar.info: We are here to support you on a daily basis in your role as parent: how could we help you? (listening, training, conferences, themes, etc.)

talents.info: Your involvement is important for your child's development: do you have talents?

snacks.label: prepare or serve a snack for children?

otherInvolvement.info: Would you be interested in participating in other activities of the Aurore's House?? (reception, secretariat, kitchen ...)
